t: r/askcarguys on Reddit: Should I get one of those cheap OBD scanners?

r/Diesel on Reddit: Can anyone recommend an obd2 scanner on Amazon? Wondering whether cheap Bluetooth ones are ok or if I should go for something a bit more expensive like the bluedriver one? Or just a wired scanner? Will be used for my ford focus diesel and checking dpf build up if possible.
s: February 9, 2023 - I have a bunch of them and can't tell any difference in the brands. A cheap ELM327 adapter with Torque Pro is a very powerful tool and should do everything you need. ... Not all of them will not read the diesel codes, like for when it's doing a regen. The OBDLink MX+ will, but it's not cheap, ...
